titleStmt.title: Cleaveland's petition to His Highnesse the Lord Protector
titleStmt.author: Cleveland, John, 1613-1658.

notesStmt.note: Identified as Wing C4683aA, reel 2365, of the UMI microfilm set "Early English books 1641-1700".
Cf. Wing C4683aA which has "P[r]otector" in the title.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
